mapper.select:
select
from tb_pay_order left join tb_user on tb_pay_order.user_id=tb_user.user_id where trade_no = #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_pay_order (id, user_id, type, trade_no, subject, description, amount, create_time, state ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{tradeNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{subject,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{state,jdbcType=BIT} )

update tb_pay_order
